sentence: Wyoming Republican Harriet Hageman, endorsed by former President Donald Trump, showed a commanding lead against the Democrat-allied Rep. Liz Cheney (R-WY) in a Saturday straw poll full of House candidates held by the Wyoming Republican State Central Committee.
author: Jacob Bliss
title: Liz Cheney Loses Wyoming Straw Poll to Trump-Backed Harriet Hageman

sentence: They ended up choosing Harriet Hageman, a Cheyenne land-use attorney and former Cheney adviser who was then a member of the Republican National Committee.
title: Where's Liz Cheney? The Wyoming Republican's Exile From Wyoming Republicans

sentence: The former president, who last summer backed Harriet Hageman in her bid to oust Cheney in this year's Republican primary and who has helped fundraise for Hageman, is now heading to Wyoming later this month to headline a rally for his endorsed candidate.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Trump to target Cheney at May 28 rally in Wyoming

sentence: Former President Trump is set to hold a rally later this month in Wyoming to boost Harriet Hageman in her primary challenge against Rep. Liz Cheney (Wyo.
author: Tal Axelrod
title: Trump to rally for Cheney challenger in Wyoming

sentence: The president is expected to rally with Harriet Hageman, a Republican primary challenger to Rep. Liz Cheney (R-WY).
author: Charlie Spiering
title: Donald Trump Announces Rally with Liz Cheney Challenger Harriet Hageman in Casper, Wyoming
